projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Sustainability,  Project 2  Title: Chemical Processing
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Sustainability

Description: Silicon compounds and Sustainable developments.

Skill sets: Communication, Active listening, Attention to details, Data analysis

Traits expectation: Confidence, Positive attitude, Curiosity

Expected learning: Importance and applicability of sustainable chemistry

Specific courses required for project execution:

Project 2

Title: Chemical Processing

Description: Equipment, Process, Heat and mass transfer

Skill sets: Communication, Active listening, Attention to details, Data analysis Traits expectation: Confidence, Positive attitude, Curiosity

Expected learning: Understanding of Machineries and processing

Specific courses required for project execution:
